name: DEREK (itch)
description:
Pizza delivery man and lighthouse keeper, fall into a space-time hole. They collect the cogs to fix the machine and get back to the right dimension. The evil side of the dimension shows the lighthouse keeper is a cruel occultist.

Wait for it to load, the game is a bit large / we will make a downloadable version for mac and linux soon. For now, you can download the windows version.

Use arrows to move.

Hold "Z" and choose direction (using arrows) for paralyzing pistol.

That`s all friends - BE FAST!
